thread.section_title: Prime Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Still grand but showing age
thread.title_full: Still grand but showing age - Review of Prime Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: fostermamabear88
title: Still grand but showing age
text:
Rooms are big, clean and comfortable. Bed is very
Comfortable..I arrived at 2 a.m. From the airport. The location was easy enough to find but was Leary to come out of cab because the entire building was dark. No one was at the entrance to welcome or greet . Staff are polite and very helpful. Lobby needs renovation. Breakfast is varied and delicious .
